amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 118-142 to strike the creation of a Center of Excellence in Ukraine.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike a feasibility study on the creation of a Center of Excellence in Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 95 - 332, 2 Present (Roll no. 305).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Greene (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 95 - 332, 2 Present (Roll no. 305).
